mapper.select:
SELECT MemberRealEstateIdx, MemberIdx, HouseName, Address, StationLine, StationName, StationRange, UseApproveDate, TotalHouseHoldCount, ParkingPossibleCount, DirectionType, Bay, SupplySpace, ExclusiveSpace, DealType, DealPrice, BrokerFee, AcquisitionTax, PropertyTotalTax, Remark, CreateDate, UpdateDate
FROM MemberRealEstate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MemberRealEstate MemberIdx, HouseName, Address, StationLine, StationName, StationRange, UseApproveDate, TotalHouseholdCount, ParkingPossibleCount, DirectionType, Bay, SupplySpace, ExclusiveSpace, DealType, DealPrice, BrokerFee, AcquisitionTax, PropertyTotalTax, Remark VALUES ( #{memberIdx}, #{houseName}, #{address}, #{stationLine}, #{stationName}, #{stationRange}, #{useApproveDate}, #{totalHouseholdCount}, #{parkingPossibleCount}, #{directionType}, #{bay}, #{supplySpace}, #{exclusiveSpace}, #{dealType}, #{dealPrice}, #{brokerFee}, #{acquisitionTax}, #{propertyTotalTax}, #{remark} )
